title: Spin studio, Air conditioning available, Full size washer/dryer
posting_body: Use this link for more info:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1166 Sq.
Urban living as vibrant and alive as its surroundings.
Leeward offers open concept one, one plus den and two bedroom floor plans with modern interiors and designer finishes.
Conveniently located in the revitalized neighborhood of South Lake Union, distinctive for its live-work-play culture, Leeward offers all the conveniences of a connected community.
Leeward is just minutes from major employers, transit options, Lake Union waterfront, shopping, dining and nightlife.
- Open concept with one, one plus den and two bedroom floor plans
- Roof decks with expansive views of Lake Union
Pet friendly, fees and restrictions apply.
Income needs to be 3x the monthly rental rate.
We also require a rental history verification.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
